variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Subject's ID

variable.name: CASE_CONTROL
variable.description: Subject type
variable.value: Control with Change in Cognitive Status

variable.name: INV
variable.description: Investigator's ID

variable.name: INVSITE
variable.description: Investigator site ID

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit name

variable.name: VISIT_DATE
variable.description: Visit date

variable.name: ASDT
variable.description: Assessment Date

variable.name: INTERPRETATION
variable.description: Interpretation

variable.name: TOTSC
variable.description: Total Score

variable.name: SATISFIED_GDSR
variable.description: 1. ARE YOU BASICALLY SATISFIED WITH YOUR LIFE? (GDS=Geriatric Depression Scale)

variable.name: MEMORY_GDSR
variable.description: 10. DO YOU FEEL YOU HAVE MORE PROBLEMS WITH MEMORY THAN MOST?

variable.name: WONDERFUL_GDSR
variable.description: 11. DO YOU THINK IT IS WONDERFUL TO BE ALIVE NOW?

variable.name: WORTHLESS_GDSR
variable.description: 12. DO YOU FEEL PRETTY WORTHLESS THE WAY YOU ARE NOW?

variable.name: ENERGY_GDSR
variable.description: 13. DO YOU FEEL FULL OF ENERGY?

variable.name: HOPELESS_GDSR
variable.description: 14. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR SITUATION IS HOPELESS?

variable.name: BETTER_OFF_GDSR
variable.description: 15. DO YOU THINK THAT MOST PEOPLE ARE BETTER OFF THAN YOU ARE?

variable.name: ACTIVITIES_GDSR
variable.description: 2. HAVE YOU DROPPED MANY OF YOUR ACTIVITIES AND INTERESTS?

variable.name: EMPTY_GDSR
variable.description: 3. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR LIFE IS EMPTY?

variable.name: BORED_GDSR
variable.description: 4. DO YOU OFTEN GET BORED?

variable.name: SPIRITS_GDSR
variable.description: 5. ARE YOU IN GOOD SPIRITS MOST OF THE TIME?

variable.name: BAD_GDSR
variable.description: 6. ARE YOU AFRAID THAT SOMETHING BAD IS GOING TO HAPPEN TO YOU?

variable.name: HAPPY_GDSR
variable.description: 7. DO YOU FEEL HAPPY MOST OF THE TIME?

variable.name: HELPLESS_GDSR
variable.description: 8. DO YOU OFTEN FEEL HELPLESS?

variable.name: HOME_GDSR
variable.description: 9. DO YOU PREFER TO STAY AT HOME, RATHER THAN GOING OUT AND DOING NEW THINGS?
